entry.title: Monday: Light snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this morning and early this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
